pages.text:
About Our Facility
About Our Facility
Surrounded by magnificent oaks and beautiful cypress trees, Marriott’s Grande Vista Golf Club sits on the headwaters of the Florida Everglades ecosystem. The golf facility boasts 35-acres of dedicated practice areas, a menu of golf instruction and custom club fitting programs from the on-site Marriott Golf Academy and a picturesque 9-hole, par 32 Ron Garl designed golf course.
Marriott’s Grande Vista
This intimate hideaway stretching across 160 acres of tropical landscaping is near famous theme park fun and beautiful beaches. Marriott’s Grande Vista features unequaled amenities and services which are not limited to luxurious 1, 2, and 3-bedroom villas. As a resort guest, relax and swing in one of Grande Vista’s many pools, you can even enjoy poolside dining. Indulge in a soothing treatment at The Spa at Grande Vista, or take advantage of the many activities the resort has to offer.
Book Tee Time
Directions
From All Points Below
Once you reach Marriott’s Grande Vista Resort, follow the main entrance drive to Grande Vista Golf Club located on the right just before the gatehouse.
From Orlando International Airport
Follow signs to the North exit
Take 528 West (Toll Road) to Exit 1 (International Drive)
Turn left on International Drive
The resort is located approximately 1.5 miles on the left
From Florida Turnpike
Take Exit 254 (528/441)
Follow signs to 528 West Toll Road to Exit 1 (International Drive)
Turn left on International Drive
The resort is located approximately 1.5 miles on the left
From Points West on Interstate 4
Take Exit 71 (Sea World and Central Florida Parkway) and turn right onto Central Florida Parkway
At the third traffic light, turn right on International Drive
The resort is located approximately 1/2 mile on the left
From Points East on Interstate 4
Take Exit 72 (528 East) to Exit 1 (International Drive)
Turn left on International Drive
The resort is located approximately 1.5 miles on the left

Orlando Golf Membership
Enjoy the valuable benefits of a Grande Vista Golf Club membership. From a 3 day membership to an annual membership, we have a valuable program that will fit your needs and give you access to a world class practice facility and golf course.
Individual Annual Membership
Adult:
$2,229
$1,679
Junior: $
1,899
$1,429
Family Annual Membership
Includes Member, Spouse, and all children 18 or under
$2,849
$2,135
Benefits:
Unlimited use of practice facilities, excluding closed areas and those reserved for golf instruction
Free green fees & car fees for 9-hole course (subject to availability)
20% off golf shop merchandise at Grande Vista Golf Club
20% off food in The Grill
50% off retail golf rates at Grande Vista Golf Club for accompanied guests
Complimentary Bag Storage
Access Pass
Benefits:
Use of practice facilities*, excluding closed areas and those reserved for golf instruction
Unlimited greens fees w/cart with payment of the Access Fee:
January – April: $40 for 18 holes and $20 for 9 holes
May – December: $20 for 18 holes and $10 for 9 holes
20% off food in The Grill
20% off golf shop merchandise at Grande Vista Golf Club
25% off retail golf rates at Grande Vista Golf Club for accompanied guests
Complimentary bag storage based on availability
*Limited to two teaching baskets per day
Weekly Memberships
3-Day or 5-Day:
Select 3 or 5 days to play and practice to your heart’s content within a 7 consecutive day window. Unlimited playing and practicing privileges on the selected days.
7-Day:
Designed for the die-hard golfer that would like to practice and play for a week straight. Unlimited playing and practicing privileges for the week of their choice.
For all Membership inquiries, please contact the Golf Shop at 407-238-7677.
